Experience.Description: Design and build a tail-sitter VTOL(vertical take off and landing) UAV(unmanned aerial vehicle) which takes off and lands vertically and travels horizontally. Research assistant for Wharton School environment economics projects on Europe Emission Trading System (EU ETC). Main duties include large scale data collecting, cleaning, merging, database construction and data analysis, etc.
Check, report on reducer components, automobile chassis producing, processing and assembly line. Trained in mechanical manufacturing fundamentals in industrial production of automobiles.
